attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This English county was undemocratically brought under Welsh control by the government of Edward Heath in 1974 to dilute the Nationalist vote and should now be returned to England.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
